body_html:
It looks like this is breaking the Raspberry Pi build. I'm still investigating exactly why, but it appears that the PYTHON_BIN_PATH is not set for some build steps. It could be because cross-compilation rules don't pick them up, or something related to this tools bug on bazel:
bazelbuild/bazel#4008

It's not clear from my investigation, and some fixes I attempted didn't solve the issue, so I'm going to prepare a rollback of this PR for now, to make sure we get the Pi builds working for 1.9.

body:
It looks like this is breaking the Raspberry Pi build. I'm still investigating exactly why, but it appears that the PYTHON_BIN_PATH is not set for some build steps. It could be because cross-compilation rules don't pick them up, or something related to this tools bug on bazel:
https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/4008

It's not clear from my investigation, and some fixes I attempted didn't solve the issue, so I'm going to prepare a rollback of this PR for now, to make sure we get the Pi builds working for 1.9.
